[Platform abstraction]

Detailed Description

The platform services structure contains elements specifying the various platform specific services as well as Start, Stop and Delete functions called during transmitter (client) start / stop / delete operations respectively.

Field Documentation

IPDR_Delete_t IPDR_tag_Platform::Delete
 

Called whenever a transmitter (client) is deleted using the IPDR_DeleteExporter() function in order to stop any tasks / threads started by the abstraction layer.

IPDR_EventServices IPDR_tag_Platform::EventServices
 

char IPDR_tag_Platform::eyecatcher[8]
 

Gets "<code>IPDRPS</code>"

IPDR_GetLastErrorMessage_t IPDR_tag_Platform::GetLastErrorMessage
 

Called to retrieve the error message corresponding to the last error that occurred in the current thread / task in an platform abstraction layer call (for example, in case of Unix, this should correspond to the current errno).

IPDR_IsRunning_t IPDR_tag_Platform::IsRunning
 

Called to test whether IPDR_StartExporter() has been done successfully.

IPDR_LockingServices IPDR_tag_Platform::LockingServices
 

IPDR_MemoryServices IPDR_tag_Platform::MemoryServices
 

IPDR_NetworkServices IPDR_tag_Platform::NetworkServices
 

IPDR_PersistenceServices IPDR_tag_Platform::PersistenceServices
 

IPDR_PlatformArg IPDR_tag_Platform::PlatformArg
 

Argument which is passed to all platform functions.

IPDR_SetExporterHandle_t IPDR_tag_Platform::SetExporterHandle
 

Called at the end of IPDR_StartExporter() to set the transmitter (client) handle in the platform abstraction (so that logging can be done from the platform abstraction).

IPDR_Start_t IPDR_tag_Platform::Start
 

Called whenever a transmitter (client) is started using the IPDR_StartExporter() function.

IPDR_Stop_t IPDR_tag_Platform::Stop
 

Called whenever a transmitter (client) is deleted using the IPDR_DeleteExporter() function in order to stop any tasks / threads started by the abstraction layer.

IPDR_TimeServices IPDR_tag_Platform::TimeServices
 

IPDR_UnsetExporterHandle_t IPDR_tag_Platform::UnsetExporterHandle
 

Called by IPDR_DeleteExporter() to unset the transmitter (client) handle in the platform abstraction.
